constituent: confucian, person, demand, rain, weather, comb
koohiiStory1: No more Confucian jibba-jabba! I demand you tell me why it´s raining combs!".
koohiiStory2: One day, Mr. T started reading the little proverbs he found in fortune cookies, and with this newfound wisdom he became a Confucian scholar. He was suddenly in high demand as people came from all over to ask for his sage advice, immensely satisfied with suggestions such as, "You will find happiness with a new love".
